content: this simple watch cap has details that make it unique a 4-inch long stockinette rectangle is nestled in the folded ribbed brim… perfect for expressing yourself this block is left blank so you can sew on a favorite patch stitch on your favorite college team sport saying monogram etc or decorate with crewel cross-stitch or embroidery quilting etc the yarn used and the stitch gauge make it very soft intentionally so you can pull the peak to lengthen the look or not
